definition: to establish/to found/to set up/to build/to construct

sentences.english: The government already has started planning a three-year rebuilding effort for the areas damaged by the earthquake.
sentences.chinese: 政府已开始针对地震灾区制定为期三年的重建计划。

sentences.english: The soldiers thought that it would be a long time before civil government would be re-established.
sentences.chinese: 士兵们认为要在很久以后才能重建平民政府。

sentences.english: Methods Two-dimensional ultrasound images scanning by free-hand were reconstructed stereoscopically in 39 patients with different diseases.
sentences.chinese: 方法采用本方法对39例患者进行了三维图像重建。

sentences.english: Along with these events there will take place a restructuration of your power structure.
sentences.chinese: 伴随这些事件的发生你们的力量组织也会得到重建。

sentences.english: Organize and Formulate Post-Disaster Production and Reconstruction Program.
sentences.chinese: 组织制定灾后生产重建规划。

sentences.english: The wooden churches were transported here and reconstructed.
sentences.chinese: 这座木构教堂是被搬运到这儿并重建的。

sentences.english: After the war came the problem of rehabilitation.
sentences.chinese: 大战以后接着而来的是重建问题。

sentences.english: Spectrum rebuilding scheme, a wavelength detection scheme with high accuracy, is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 利用光谱重建法，得到了一种高精度的波长检测方案。

sentences.english: Bi-pedicle muscular flap were used to reconstruct the larynx.
sentences.chinese: 残喉创面修复用双蒂肌软骨膜瓣重建喉功能。

sentences.english: South Korea, in particular, dreads the cost of rebuilding the North.
sentences.chinese: 尤其是韩国，对于重建北方的花销心存畏惧。

sentences.english: The theology of restoring our people.
sentences.chinese: 对于我们人们重建的神学。

sentences.english: Jet Li has decided to quit acting for a year to focus on disaster relief and reconstruction of quake-hit areas.
sentences.chinese: 李连杰决定息影一年，专注赈灾及灾区重建工作。

sentences.english: The calculated field data are applied to reconstruct the contour projections of the scatterer successfully.
sentences.chinese: 计算结果用于散射体轮廓的投影重建获得成功。

sentences.english: Their water pump was being rebuilt nearby.
sentences.chinese: 她家的水泵当时正在附近重建。

sentences.english: Postoperative septic arthritis is an uncommon complication after anterior cruciate ligament reconstruction.
sentences.chinese: 前叉重建后感染性关节炎是一种罕见的并发症。

sentences.english: A monetary rule is a requisite for restoring the Fed’s independence.
sentences.chinese: 货币规则是重建美联储独立性的不二法门。

definition: to repair/to refurbish/to renovate/to refit/to mend/to rebuild
Fuxing district of Handan city 邯鄲市|邯郸市[Han2 dan1 shi4], Hebei/Fuxing or Fuhsing township in Taoyuan county 桃園縣|桃园县[Tao2 yuan2 xian4], north Taiwan
to restore/to renovate/restoration/(computing) to fix (a bug)
to spruce up/to renovate/to tend (a garden)/to groom (one's hair)/to finish (a rough surface)/to trim (a lawn)/to touch up (a photo)
to reinstate/to resume/to restore/to recover/to regain/to rehabilitate
